storagefileformats: Still pictures: JPEG Movies: AVI (Motion-JPEG compliant)

incameraimageediting: Crop D-Lighting Rotate image Skin softening Small Picture
exposurecontrol: Programmed auto exposure (shutter speed, ND filter selection and ISO sensitivity) Flexible program with motion detection
lens: 5x optical Zoom, NIKKOR ED glass lens
batterylifeshotspercharge: AA Alkaline: 220 shots AA Lithium: 680 shots EN-MH2: 370 shots
aperture: Electronically controlled ND filter (-2.6 AV) insertion
scenemodes: Back Light Beach Close Up Copy Dusk/Dawn Fireworks Show Food Landscape Museum Night Night Portrait Panorama Party/Indoor Pet Portrait Portrait Scene Auto Selector Snow Sports Sunset
focusrange: [W]: Approx. 1 ft. (30 cm.) to infinity [T]: Approx. 2 ft. (60 cm.) to infinity Macro close-up mode: [W]: Approx. 1.2 in. (3 cm.) to infinity
storagemedia: SD memory card SDHC memory card SDXC memory card
shutterspeed: 1/2000-1 sec. (when ISO sensitivity set to Auto) 4 sec. (when scene mode is set to Fireworks show)
supportedlanguages: Arabic Brazilian Portuguese Chinese (Simplified and Traditional) Czech Dutch Finnish French German Greek Hindi Hungarian Indonesian Italian Japanese Korean Norwegian Polish Portuguese Romanian Russian Spanish Swedish Thai Turkish Ukranian Vietnamese
lensfocallength: 4.0-20.0mm (angle of view equivalent to that of 28-140mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
topcontinuousshootingspeed: Up to 4 shots at approx. 1.2 frames per second (at full resolution)
continuousshootingoptions: Best Shot Selector Continuous Multi-shot 16 Single
digitalzoom: Up to 4x (angle of view equivalent to that of 560mm lens in 35mm [135] format)

whitebalance: Auto Cloudy Daylight Flash Fluorescent Incandescent Manual
